description:
Support Vector Machine based prediction models for drug repurposing and designing novel drugs for colorectal cancer.

ColoRecPred-Colorectal Cancer Drug Activity Prediction Server.

Colorectal Cancer Drug Activity Prediction Server.

ColoRecPred has been developed to predict the drug activities of the unknown compounds/molecules to alleviate Drug Development and Discovery.

ColoRecPred is a webserver developed to predict the drug activity of unknown molecules or compounds. The prediction server has been developed using AI/ML QSAR models. The webserver can be utilised by the researchers all around the world to evaluate the drug activity on the specific cell lines of colorectal cancer.
name: ColoRecPred
